author: Aliok
title: Patch 7.0.3 (undocumented changes)
text: The trash mobs in Warlord Zon'ozz 's room no longer aggro when you pull the boss. World Events Shade of the Horseman now scales in level for players instead of remaining a level 11 mob. [ Water Bucket ] is no longer available as an item. Additional quests for the world event have been added in the Broken Isles . Bug Fixes [ Finish Them! ] to be earned. User Interface The experience bar now fills up when gaining experience instead of immediately jumping to the current amount. The Achievement panel now has its very own search box! [8] The following sub-categories have been added for Legacy achievements : Dungeons, Raids, Player vs. Player, Currencies The following sub-categories have been added for Feats of Strength achievements : Mounts, Dungeons, Raids, Player vs. Player, Reputation, Events, Promotions The Garrisons category has been renamed to Draenor Garrison. Low Level Quests under Tracking has been renamed to Hidden Quests. Trivial quests are now signified by a pale version of instead of the normal bright yellow. Trivial daily quests are now signified by a pale version of instead of the normal bright blue. Flight path and vignette icons on maps are now larger and light up on mouse hover. The zone and subzone name appear larger when changing zone or subzone. The Adventure Guide has been updated with pre- Cataclysm raids and their loot. World bosses are not included. Master Loot has been renamed to Guild Master Loot and now requires that 80% or more of the group must belong to the guild. Groups that make extensive use of players outside of their guild for their raiding are encouraged to use Personal Loot instead. [9] Round Robin has been removed. [10] Learning a profession recipe now also displays a toast window. Nodes now appear gray on the minimap if they are above or below the player, with an accordingly displayed arrow indicator. Gems are now categorized in the Auction House according to their stat bonus rather than gem color. Rare mobs are now shown as a golden star on the minimap instead of . System and Interface Setting Changes View Distance, Environment Detail, and Ground Clutter are now sliders. Sound options lost Headphone Mode and gained Distance Filtering, as well as a specific Sound Cache size setting. The screen will now flash red at low health, with an option to disable the feature. There is now the option to have a small health and resource bar display near your character. Nameplates can be shown always, or just in combat. Combo points are no longer listed in the Floating Combat Text options. Consolidate buffs is no longer listed in the Buffs and Debuffs options [11] due to the removal of raid buffs . Toggling CVar ffxGlow to "0" (off) no longer disables the screen blur when your character is drunk . References
